short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Build and create custom knowledge repositories that you can easily incorporate into LLMs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add knowledge into ChatGPT. Customize your ChatGPT experience by easily adding in knowledge modules that you can create or select from other modules that users have built.
